pageContent.descriptionText: <Introtext style="font-family:Helvetica; font-size:16pt; font-weight:bold; color:#cc0033; margin:10px; padding:0 0 0 5px; background:#e8e8e8; border-bottom:1px solid #333; display:block;">Well Done</Introtext><welcomeText style=" font-family:Helvetica; font-size:12pt; line-height:18pt; text-align:justify; font-weight:normal; color:#333; display:block; margin:0 10px 10px">Nice work. Asking Dr. Bennett about prescriber education needs, as well as what is affecting his practice, gives you valuable information about the market and industry trends he believes are most important to his practice. By engaging Dr. Bennett in this kind of conversation, you gain his buy-in, increasing the chances that he will attend the speaker program and give you another opportunity for pull-through.</welcomeText>
